# CHAPTER ONE
## INTRODUCTION
This chapter shall be devoted to primarily to justifying the research work. Accordingly, the chapter shall contain the following among others:

* A general overview of the background, concept, general objective and scope of the research. This may not necessarily entail citing references, but may include statement of the problem, significance/purpose of study
* General aim and specific objectives of the research and/or working hypotheses/research questions, as the case may be
* Specific proposals (statements only) on how to achieve the specific research objectives or test the working hypotheses/research questions stated above
* Scope and limitations of the research
